tooltips.currencyDecimal: Use the Decimal DB type. In the app, values will be represented as strings. Check this parameter if precision is required.
tooltips.cutHeight: A text higher then a specified value will be cut with a 'show more' button displayed.
tooltips.urlStrip: Strip a protocol and a trailing slash.
tooltips.audited: Updates will be logged in stream.
tooltips.required: Field will be mandatory. Can't be left empty.
tooltips.default: Value will be set by default upon creating.
tooltips.seeMoreDisabled: If not checked then long texts will be shortened.
tooltips.lengthOfCut: How long text can be before it will be cut.
tooltips.before: The date value should be before the date value of the specified field.
tooltips.after: The date value should be after the date value of the specified field.
tooltips.readOnly: Field value can't be specified by user. But can be calculated by formula.
tooltips.readOnlyAfterCreate: The field value can be specified when creating a new record. After that, the field becomes read-only. It can still be calculated by formula.
tooltips.preview: Show the preview button. Applicable if Markdown is enabled.
tooltips.fileAccept: Which file types to accept. It's possible to add custom items.
tooltips.maxFileSize: If empty or 0 then no limit.
tooltips.conversionDisabled: The currency conversion action won't be applied to this field.
tooltips.pattern: A regular expression to check a field value against. Define an expression or select a predefined one.
tooltips.options: A list of possible values and their labels.
tooltips.optionsArray: A list of possible values and their labels. If empty, the field will allow entering custom values.
tooltips.maxCount: Maximum number of items allowed to be selected.
tooltips.displayAsList: Each item in a new line.
tooltips.linkReadOnly:
Field value can't be specified by user. But can be calculated by formula.

It will also disable the ability to create a related record from relationship panels.
tooltips.relateOnImport: When importing with this field, it will automatically relate a record with a matching foreign record. Use this functionality only if the foreign field is considered as unique.

fieldInfo.enum: Selectbox, only one value can be selected.
fieldInfo.text: A multiline text with markdown support.
fieldInfo.currency: A currency value. A float number with a currency code.
fieldInfo.float: A number with a decimal part.
fieldInfo.bool: A checkbox. Two possible values: true and false.
fieldInfo.multiEnum: A list of values, multiple values can be selected. The list is ordered.
fieldInfo.array: A list of values, similar to Multi-Enum field.
fieldInfo.address: An address with street, city, state, postal code and country.
fieldInfo.number: An auto-incrementing number of string type with a possible prefix and specific length.
fieldInfo.autoincrement: A generated read-only auto-incrementing integer number.
fieldInfo.barcode: A barcode. Can be printed to PDF.
fieldInfo.email: A set of email addresses with their parameters: Opted-out, Invalid, Primary.
fieldInfo.phone: A set of phone numbers with their parameters: Type, Opted-out, Invalid, Primary.
fieldInfo.foreign: A field of a related record. Read-only.
fieldInfo.link: A record related through Belongs-To (many-to-one or one-to-one) relationship.
fieldInfo.linkParent: A record related through Belongs-To-Parent relationship. Can be of different entity types.
fieldInfo.linkMultiple: A set of records related through Has-Many (many-to-many or one-to-many) relationship. Not all relationships have their link-multiple fields. Only those do, where Link-Multiple parameter(s) is enabled.

messages.fieldCreatedAddToLayouts: Field has been created. Now, you can add it to [layouts]({link})
messages.confirmRemove:
Are you sure you want to remove the *{field}* field?

Field removal does not remove data from the database. Data from the database will be removed if you run hard rebuild.
messages.linkWithSameNameAlreadyExists: Link with the name '{field}' already exists in '{entityType}'.
